description:
Ilene is the current day Queen of the realm and Lady of the Aldoran Castle. She presided over the tournament that Ash won and then presented him with Aaron`s staff. Queen Rin, who lived at Aldoran Castle is Ilene`s ancestor.
When Aaron`s Lucario was recalled from Aaron`s staff, she explained the situation to Aaron`s Lucario. She told him that the events he thought happened yesterday were actually many years ago. She then told him that she knew he had disappeared during the battle near Aldoran Castle. While Ash and his friends were in search of Pikachu, Ilene worried about them the entire time.
name: Aileen
